storyInfo: A casual comment by the Doctor causes Executor to begin noticing colors around him.

attributes.content: ...Target has been placed into custody and the lost medical supplies retrieved. One operator suffered a mild ankle sprain during the operation.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: That is all I have to report about the mission. I have been asked to communicate my superiors' gratitude for Rhodes Island's support of Lateran citizens abroad.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: The Notarial Hall would be honored to welcome you while Rhodes Island is stationed near Laterano.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: It was the right thing to do.;We'll go if we have time, Federico.

attributes.content: I will pass on your answer. If there is nothing else, I will take my leave.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: One moment, Federico.

attributes.content: Do you have another task you need me to perform?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Many of our younger patients have improved.;Medical is throwing a party to celebrate.;I got a message telling me to dress up more, er, 'interesting'.

attributes.content: 'Interesting'... that's rather vague. Are there any more details?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Maybe they think my clothes are too monotone.;Maybe I need to wear more colors.
Bibeak sent me a dozen party hats. Which do you think works best?

attributes.content: They are all conical. The only difference is the color.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: True.

attributes.content: I am afraid I cannot give you a useful opinion. I perceive all colors the same way.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: People always praise your color coordination.;You wear a lot of colors.

attributes.content: This an official Notarial Hall uniform. I did not choose it.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: What about when you're off-duty?

attributes.content: The same.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: I have seven sets of identical uniforms that I wear whether I'm on duty or off.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: You look disappointed, Doctor.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: That's not it.;Just a bit.

attributes.content: Executor has been sitting there for a while. Am I imagining things, or has he not moved at all?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Not according to my measurements. You don't often see Sankta so quiet...
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: You're new... you don't know...
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Know what?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: One fugitive on the run, two hidden mines, three massive holes, and... leaky evenings beyond reckoning.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Ahem. What are you two doing? I'll slash your pay if I catch you talking bad about a guy behind his back.
C-Closure! What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Just looking for the Doctor. There's been a question of what color hat to wear to the party. I'm curious if the Doctor's come to a decision yet.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Is that Sankta going to sit there all day? Rhodes Island is pretty big. Can't he sit somewhere else?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Hey, Sankta! You'd better move. It's going to rain, and you're gonna wanna hurry if you're going back to Laterano, unless you're gonna make the trip in a downpour.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Closure the Vampire, Chief Engineer of Rhodes Island... threat level downgraded from Extreme to Low one year ago.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: No special action required.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: (Whisper) Should I feel insulted?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Do you have to be daydreaming here, of all places, Sankta?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'm just pondering what color a party hat should be.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: The Doctor asked you? Hmm... rapid fire! What color am I wearing right now?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Black and red.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: But your question does not answer mine. It does not help me determine the proper color for the hat.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Maybe you should install a color sensor and the associated algorithms to help you perceive the differences between colors.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I'll even give you a discount.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: The installation of mechanical parts in the human brain is impractical at current technology levels. In addition...
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Your experience with cranial surgery is unreliable.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Adjusting reliability rating of Closure the Vampire to Extremely Low.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Alright, my bad, my bad, I shouldn't have made fun of you.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: What is this?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: An anonymous artist is holding an exhibition at the Lateran Basilica this weekend, and Rhodes Island got a few free tickets.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: I was going to give them to the younger operators, but maybe this'll do you some good.
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Now... can we talk about making some adjustments to my profile?
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.options: Closure kept the operator coming with me a secret. Never thought it would be you.

attributes.content: Being both an operator of Rhodes Island and a citizen of Laterano, I do not think it is a surprise that I am here.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: I'm surprised you come to an art show in your free time.;I didn't think you would be interested in an art show.

attributes.content: Your doubts are justified. I prefer to spend my time testing and maintaining my weapons, and getting proper rest.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: But you came anyway.

attributes.content: I had to supplement my knowledge on colors to complete the mission you gave me yesterday. What about you, Doctor? The Notarial Hall was not notified of your visit to Laterano.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: It wasn't a mission, Federico.;This isn't an official visit.;The kids wanted me to go with them.

attributes.content: Did you need art credits for your finals too, Mr. Sankta?
attributes.name: Energetic Young Operator

attributes.content: It is not part of my annual performance analysis.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: No fair, Doctor. Why doesn't he need to take exams?
attributes.name: Sullen Young Operator

attributes.options: Want something to eat?;I'll buy you an ice cream so forget about it.

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor. I'd like strawberry, please.
attributes.name: Sullen Young Operator

attributes.content: Pineapple!
attributes.name: Energetic Young Operator

attributes.options: What about you, Federico?

attributes.content: I do not need anything. I do have a membership card for the ice cream shop, though.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Thank you.
See you at the gallery.;You go in first. I'll find you later.

attributes.content: You have been standing in front of this painting for a long time. I assume it is appealing to you.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Yes, it is.
I'm curious about the colors the artist used.;I'm interested in the shapes and figures on the canvas.

attributes.content: The color blue comprises 71% of the painting, followed by green and white.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Other colors comprise less than one percent and can be considered negligible.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Is that all you see, Federico?

attributes.content: The boundaries of the colors are clearly defined, indicating the artist's preference for order and principles.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: There are very few straight lines or corners. The principal elements are circles, ovals and curves, and the lines are smooth and round.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Do these visual elements give you any particular feelings?

attributes.content: I have studied the visual influence of shapes in order to understand the emotions of others. There are many cases that indicate one's subconscious preference for a shape is connected to their psychological profile.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Interesting. Elaborate.

attributes.content: The orderly and balanced arrangement of the forms indicate that the artist was in a calm and tranquil state of mind.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Doctor...
attributes.name: Sullen Young Operator

attributes.content: I think my eyes are gonna burst from all the blue.
attributes.name: Sullen Young Operator

attributes.content: The artist must have been really excited when painting it.
attributes.name: Energetic Young Operator

attributes.content: We came to opposite conclusions based on the colors and shapes used by the painting. How can one be calm and excited at the same time?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: I do not understand.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: People are complex.;Anything is possible.

attributes.content: Your Beatitude, Saint Federico, this is such a wondrous surprise. I thought the staff were out of their minds when they said they saw you in the crowd.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Good morning, Reverend Simeone. Is His Holiness here?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: No, I am on my own. And who might you be?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, from Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: It is an honor to meet you, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.options: The honor is all mine, Sir Simeone.

attributes.content: Are you here on official duty?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Of course not. Today is Sunday, it's the sabbath.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Don't tell anyone, but I'm the anonymous artist behind this exhibition. I didn't want it to be a distraction while I'm still a gun-knight.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: What of Your Beatitude? Are you really here to appreciate the art?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Yes, Reverend Simeone.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Now, you're the last man I expected to be joking. I know, I know, Notarial Hall business, right?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.options: I can vouch that Federico's not here for anything complicated.

attributes.content: I came to learn more about colors.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: You've come to the right person, then.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.options: You've piqued my interest, too.;What can you tell us?

attributes.content: While there is a degree of subjectivity in individual perception of color, we have also achieved a degree of consensus over what different colors represent.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: For example, red is considered stimulating, and represents excitement and passion.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: As one who considers himself mild-mannered, however, I rarely use it in my artwork.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Five years ago, you...
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: (Loudly) Now, let me talk about my favorite color.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.options: Let's hear what he has to say.;(Whisper) Although you're not the only one who's a little skeptical.

attributes.content: I noticed that you use a lot of blue in your artwork.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Very astute of you. The tranquility, reason and depth represented by blue is my life's pursuit.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: In addition, it also calms the mind, helping them feel peace and tranquility... hey, was that a camera flash?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Hey, what the hell are you doing, you little runt!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Yeah, you! Who said you could use flash? Get away from my painting! Further!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Now, where were we...?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Blue helps one feel peace and tranquility.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Yes, blue... the resting place of my soul, the symbol of eternity... such beauty...
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Excuse me, Reverend Simeone, there is something you need to know.
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff

attributes.content: Pardon me, I should look into this.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: His words and actions are highly contradictory. I find it hard to trust the information he provided about the color blue.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: One moment, Federico.

attributes.content: Do you find his statements credible?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Colors can have complex emotional implications. Maybe we can delve further.;There are many things affecting emotion. Color is only one of them.
There are more factors that need to be considered when thinking about the impact of color on emotion.

attributes.content: The natural flaw of man means that I will have to spend much time to achieve this goal.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: But you're not afraid of the challenge, are you?;But you're never afraid.

attributes.content: True, Doctor, I am not.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Excuse me, Your Beatitude, we have need of you.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.options: Oh?

attributes.content: Closer, please. We can't be overheard...
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.options: What happened?

attributes.content: Doctor, you should leave with the young operators.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: What about you?

attributes.content: I have an emergency mission.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Dear guests, we regret to inform you that there has been an emergency. We ask that you remain calm and proceed to the nearest exit side for evacuation.
attributes.name: PA

attributes.content: Why is there a bomb here?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: There was an armed altercation in the Basilica yesterday. We thought the explosives left behind by the suspect had been cleaned up.
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff

attributes.content: Is there anything Your Beatitude can do?
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff

attributes.content: I believe that casualties can be avoided even if there is an explosion.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: But the whole gallery above... all the artwork...
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff

attributes.content: Understood. New mission objective: protect the artwork on exhibit.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Time is short. Action must be taken quickly.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff

attributes.content: Make sure no one follows me.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: There is sufficient distance from the crowd and the artwork, and sufficient cover on the roof to keep the blast radius to three meters.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: This is an appropriate spot to move the bomb.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Set. Countdown. Decem, novem, octo, septem...
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Quinque, quattuor, tres, duo, unus.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: No significant difference between expected and actual blast radius. Damage to exterior buildings noted. A 1.75 square meter hole has appeared in the roof. There are no casualties, and no damage to artwork.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Bomb threat has been neutralized.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: The bomb has been detonated on the roof. No harm has been done to personnel or the exhibit.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: The danger has been eliminated. The exhibition may continue.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Your Beatitude, er... you should leave, quickly, before...
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff

attributes.content: You seem to have feelings of concern, fear... and regret.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: The response is unexpected based on the outcome. Please elaborate.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: You left so quickly with the bomb that I didn't have the chance to tell you, but the most important work of art in the exhibition was...
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff

attributes.content: Get out of my way! Saint or not, that bastard is going to get it!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: I spent an entire year painting that dome! I won't let this go unanswered!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: I never moved.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Well, you've got nerve, at least.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: I apologize for damaging your work. I shall reassess the mission completion status and compensate you for your loss.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Compensate? You think the time and effort I spent on the dome can be made up for with money?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: If necessary, I can restore it to the precise condition it was in.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: I have carefully observed every corner of the gallery, including the dome. It will not be difficult to restore it from memory.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Are you trying to insult me?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Even if you can recreate the touch of the brush, you could never restore the passion and inspiration in my heart and mind when I painted it!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: 'The precise condition it was in'? You don't know what you're talking about.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Why the frown? Not happy?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: No, I am thinking about what else could be done.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: I am trying to infer your emotions at the time through my memory of the artwork.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: What's the point, even if you could do it? It's become blurred with the memories, it shattered when the dome did.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: All that's left is the sky through the hole.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: The sky...
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: The executor looks up at where the dome used to be, as the sun shines down gently through the hole.
He feels a gentle warmth on his face.

attributes.options: It's been raining heavily these past few days. I haven't had a chance to see the blue sky.

attributes.content: I thought you took the young operators back to the ship, Doctor.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Don't worry, they're safe at our branch office.;The young operators are safe. I came back because I was worried.

attributes.content: I am sorry that I cannot ensure that your visit will be smooth... I must make new plans.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Shh... look at the sky, Federico.

attributes.content: There you are, Doctor.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: I came to check on the injured children.

attributes.content: We found the children in the cellar to be in a state of malnutrition, four of them severely, with one in critical condition.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Their odds of survival would have increased greatly if we arrived one day earlier.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Are you injured?;What's with your shoulder?

attributes.content: There is a wound at the base of the shoulder.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: What are you holding, Federico?

attributes.content: A drawing from a child.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Looks like we have a very talented young artist on the ship.
What did you see up there?

attributes.content: The blue sky.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: The child told me that he was imprisoned in a place of darkness, but he saw a shade of blue just as he was about to lose all hope.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: It comforted him.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: You didn't mention anything blue at the scene.

attributes.content: I believe he did, in fact, see it. I broke into the cellar from above. There was a high chance that he saw the blue sky.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Yes, the blue sky is comforting.;Yes, a shade of blue like the sky is comforting.

attributes.content: Federico feels you pat him on the shoulder. He looks down at the blue sky on the drawing.
It's good that the rain's finally stopped. It's been overcast for so many days that I can feel mold growing on me.
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff A

attributes.content: The sun's so warm... I just want to lie down and take it in.
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff B

attributes.content: It drives all the darkness and gloom away.
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff A

attributes.content: Look, even Reverend Simeone is entranced by the sunlight.
attributes.name: Exhibition Staff B

attributes.content: What a beautiful blue. I think I saw it in a dream.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: It blends perfectly with my artwork. All the blue I used on the dome was only there to complement its beauty.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: After a few days of heavy rain, the sky is a shade of painted blue.
The wind spreads the paint out, from far to near, from deep to light, blending and stacking colors, dyeing it a beautiful shade between blue and green.
Everyone is looking up at it with an entranced expression, their hearts filled with happiness and comfort.
The feeling spreads through the streets, as passersby slow and diners put their forks and knives down...

attributes.options: Looks like the danger has passed.

attributes.content: Yes, the incident has been resolved, as you can see.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: You said incident resolved, rather than mission complete.

attributes.content: I did not complete my mission, as a work of art was damaged in the bomb disposal process.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: But everyone looks happy.

attributes.content: That is because of the sky.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Sunday, sunny, the sky a rare shade of blue.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Those who see this shade of blue exhibit enlarged pupils and lift the corners of their mouths, indicating feelings of joy.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: More information is required to determine the correlation between this special shade of blue and positive emotions.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Bah, stop muttering over there.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: ...Understood.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: (Pat him on the shoulder);(Look into his eyes);(Do nothing)

attributes.content: I am unsure what this physical contact means.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: No special meaning to it, Federico.
I just want you to look at the sky with me for a while.

attributes.content: What are you trying to say, Doctor?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: There's no need to remember all that.
What we really should remember is the color of the sky, here and now.

attributes.content: After a moment of silence, the executor looks up again, at the clear blue sky through the hole.
His expression is calm and stoic, unlike the calm and easy expressions on the faces of the others.
You wordlessly cast your gaze at the sky with him.

attributes.options: Federico? I think it's time for us to go.

attributes.content: How long have we been standing here?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: One and a half hours.

attributes.content: One and a half hours... I find that hard to believe.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: All the staff have left. It's just the two of us here.;Look at your watch. A machine doesn't lie.

attributes.content: Confirmed that one hour, thirty-seven minutes and sixteen seconds have passed.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: This represents a significant deviation from the perceived passage of time.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: I have never experienced it.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Are you alright?;You look uneasy.

attributes.content: I must go with you, Doctor, and receive a full examination from the Medical Department.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: What happened?

attributes.content: There is a high probability that this rare shade of blue represents a pathological factor for me. I must ascertain if it will affect my performance on future missions.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Three days later
I apologize for the trouble I caused the Medical Department with my sudden request for examination.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: It's okay. No trouble at all.;Don't worry about it.
Oh, and I just got a message from Closure.
She says you should meet her in Engineering.

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Are you picking a boutonniere?
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: Yes, my attendance has been requested at an important occasion.

attributes.content: I recommend azure.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: It's a memorial service for a scholar who recently passed away.;Azure? I'm going to a funeral.

attributes.content: Understood, azure is not suitable for such an occasion.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor. I request my leave if there are no other missions.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: See you later, Federico.;I look forward to our next meeting.

attributes.content: I've got it, Doctor.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: What?;Tell me more.

attributes.content: Your jacket is navy-blue.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: What?

attributes.content: See you later, Doctor.
attributes.name: Executor

attributes.options: My jacket... it's always been navy blue.;...Hehe.
